mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13
  • Processor: Intel i5 processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 4GB Memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13
  • Processor: Intel i5 processor+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 4GB Memory+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Spring in Summer Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0GHz+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A storytelling sandbox adventure driven by your own personality about helping a jackalope ghost who cannot move on. Explore a mystical island inhabited by quirky mythical creatures, connect with the hearts of its community, & discover one’s heart fulfillment in your own heartwarming personal journey
